On a large landscaped allotment (approx 773sqm) in one of Essendon's most exclusive streetscapes, this stunning residence presents a truly aspirational family environment with its vast and versatile floorplan, premium inclusions and sensational living/entertaining spaces both inside and out. Luxe Living In A Class Of Its Own
When it comes to family living on a grand scale, rarely will you find the elegance, sophistication and attention to detail of this extraordinary home. Just seven years old and approximately 50sq in size, this wonderful Mar Lodge residence with a stunning street presence blends contemporary and traditional styles, an extensive range of luxurious living spaces, high ceilings throughout, an enormous alfresco entertaining area with outdoor kitchen, and an elaborate master suite of grand proportions. In a prime location just a short walk to Keilor Rd and North Essendon Village and 9km to the city via the nearby freeway, this breathtaking home also boasts a custom-designed Aquacon concrete pool with solar heating, glass tiling and in-floor cleaning system, and 9x6m Dreamcourts basketball court for endless hours of play!

Alfresco entertaining with heated pool

Coveted position in Mar Lodge Estate

The huge undercover entertaining area features a merbau deck, built in Grand Fire gas barbecue, A-Grade canopies, industrial rangehood, ceiling fans, sound system and stunning aluminium shutters. An extraordinary family residence within an elite school zone surrounded by excellent community facilities including Buckley Park, Steele Creek Trail, Hoffmans and Keilor Road.
